The newest machine to help out with your mining operation is the Ore Thief 3000! (patent pending). For a mere 9 Copper Bars, you too can avoid the drudgery and tedium of placing Ore into Storage Hoppers and instead allow us to do the hard work for you!
With a massive 100 units of internal storage, the Ore Thief 3000 can offload to any adjacent Storage Hopper at up to 3,300 per minute!
Simply build our brand-new Ore Thief 3000 (tm) in a 3x3 layout and supply with a mere 5 power per Ore, then just stand on it and let US do the hard work for you!
